<strong>FlatOut 2</strong> is a video game produced by [[Bugbear Entertainment]].
<br />
It works well with [[D9VK]], with a few glitches - as can be seen below.

==Additional Info==
This game was tested by u/Kron4ek on the [[D9VK Subreddit]].
<br />
The testing information has been copied over to [[user:Tedster]]'s D9VK GitHub repository for the sake of unification and sustainability, available at:
<br />
https://github.com/TedsterTech/d9vk_test/blob/master/working_well/flatout2/flatout2.md
